scripts.build: npm install && yarn antlr && yarn preparechromebuild && yarn build-js && yarn bundlechrome && yarn preparefirefoxbuild && yarn build-js && yarn bundlefirefox && yarn prepareedgebuild && yarn build-js && yarn bundleedge
scripts.build-dev: npm install && yarn antlr && yarn preparechromebuild && yarn build-jsdev && yarn bundlechrome && yarn extractchrome && yarn preparefirefoxbuild && yarn build-jsdev && yarn bundlefirefox && yarn extractfirefox && yarn prepareedgebuild && yarn build-jsdev && yarn bundleedge && yarn extractedge && yarn jest
scripts.build-prod: npm install && yarn antlr && yarn preparechromebuild && yarn build-js && yarn bundlechrome && yarn extractchrome && yarn preparefirefoxbuild && yarn build-js && yarn bundlefirefox && yarn extractfirefox && yarn prepareedgebuild && yarn build-js && yarn bundleedge && yarn extractedge && yarn jest
scripts.bundlechrome: yarn shx rm -rf ./dist/chromeExtension.zip && yarn shx mv chromemanifest.json manifest.json && yarn jszip-cli add -o ./dist/chromeExtension.zip bin manifest.json logo.drawio.png -i firefoxExtension.zip && yarn shx mv manifest.json chromemanifest.json
scripts.bundlefirefox: yarn shx rm -rf ./dist/firefoxExtension.zip && yarn shx mv firefoxmanifest.json manifest.json && yarn jszip-cli add -o ./dist/firefoxExtension.zip bin manifest.json logo.drawio.png -i chromeExtension.zip && yarn shx mv manifest.json firefoxmanifest.json
scripts.bundleedge: yarn shx rm -rf ./dist/edgeExtension.zip && yarn shx mv edgemanifest.json manifest.json && yarn jszip-cli add -o ./dist/edgeExtension.zip bin manifest.json logo.drawio.png -i edgeExtension.zip && yarn shx mv manifest.json edgemanifest.json
scripts.extractchrome: yarn shx rm -rf ./dist/chromeExtension/*/*.* && yarn jszip-cli extract -o ./dist/chromeExtension ./dist/chromeExtension.zip
scripts.extractfirefox: yarn shx rm -rf ./dist/firefoxExtension/*/*.* && yarn jszip-cli extract -o ./dist/firefoxExtension ./dist/firefoxExtension.zip
scripts.extractedge: yarn shx rm -rf ./dist/firefoxedgeeExtension/*/*.* && yarn jszip-cli extract -o ./dist/edgeExtension ./dist/edgeExtension.zip
